definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: Oxy-hydrogen flame can replace other flames for cutting billet.
sentences.chinese: 完全可以代替其它燃氣用於連鑄坯切割。

sentences.english: Development and Application of Continuous Rolling Mill Set for Round Aluminum Pole in Qingtongxia Aluminum Group Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 電工圓鋁杆連鑄連軋機組在我公司的發展應用。

sentences.english: The principal processes and physical metallurgy of direct connection of continuous casting-hot rolling technology is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了連鑄連軋的基本方式及其金屬學特點。

sentences.english: The possibility of transverse corner cracking in slab of peritectic carbon steel is greater than that of other carbon steels.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了影響包晶碳鋼角橫裂的連鑄工藝操作和設備。

sentences.english: The displayed models use 500 ccm ATV Motor which are already mass produced.
sentences.chinese: 展出的汽車模型，用500連鑄亞視目前已批量生產。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the stopper auto control system of Conti.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了鍊鋼廠連鑄生產中的塞棒自動控制系統。

sentences.english: The billet crack breakout would take place often in the process of continuous casting.
sentences.chinese: 鑄坯裂紋漏鋼在連鑄生產過程中經常發生。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the application of magnesia coating in tundish for CSP caster.
sentences.chinese: 介紹鎂質噴塗料在CSP連鑄中間罐上的應用。

sentences.english: In this paper the on-line real-time detecting system of molder surface temperature of continuous casting is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了連鑄鑄坯表面溫度在線實時測量系統。

sentences.english: An investigation has been carried out into the "metallurgical criterion" of the slab solidification during continuous casting.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了連鑄坯凝固冷卻過程的“冶金標準”。

sentences.english: Continuous casting low-temperature molten steel, micro-electricity of micro-micro-particle, and casting blank speeding-up and normal pouring.
sentences.chinese: 連鑄低溫鋼水，微微粒子的微電，鑄坯提速正常澆製。

sentences.english: Breakout prediction system (BOPS) is a key technical equipment of high efficient continuous casting technique.
sentences.chinese: 漏鋼預報系統屬於高效連鑄生產的關鍵工藝和裝備。

sentences.english: EUROSTRIP ○R direct strip production technology is steadily consolidating its advanced position in strip casting.
sentences.chinese: 技術在帶鋼連鑄生產領域穩居領先地位。

sentences.english: The electromagnetic soft-contact continuous casting(EMCC) technique is a novel technique.
sentences.chinese: 電磁軟接觸連鑄技術是一門新興技術。

sentences.english: A description is made of new technology for producing starter sheets of copper electrolysis by continuous casting and rolling.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了連鑄連軋法生產電解銅始極片的新工藝。

sentences.english: The paper introduces servo drive technology applied in Horizontal Continuous Casting System.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了伺服驅動技術在水平連鑄中的應用。
